values: It's been a while since I have posted something. Like my icon, isn't he cute? Anyway, school's been out for a week. Thank goodness! I pulled two all-nighters this semester, isn't that nice? Sense the sarcasm... I must say I was very worried about what grades I would get this semester, but it turned out to be really good. InDesign Advanced - B Flash Basic - B Drawing I - A Illustrator - A Aren't ya proud of me? A big congratulations go out to my sister who graduated this past Thursday with high honors! I am very proud of myself cause I learned how to join a community and I posted a request in for Yuki Sohma and Tohru Honda from Fruits Basket. Don't be mad at me Tohru/Kyo fans, but I really do think there is something between Yuki and Tohru and so, I am going to write about it. Well, that's it for now. I swear I'm gonna fall asleep on my keyboard. ~Kaze
